abstract: Editorial condemns parliamentary maneuver by Northern Ireland's Democratic Unionist Party scuttling legislation meant to ensure marriage equality; contrasts situation with that in Republic of Ireland, where passage of gay marriage is being widely celebrated; holds that unionists, and their short-sided view, will eventually pass from power.
lead_paragraph: A motion to legalize same-sex marriage in Northern Ireland is blocked, causing a disconnect along the border.

headline.main: Gay Marriage Derailed in Northern Ireland
headline.print_headline: Gay Marriage Derailed in Northern Ireland

snippet: A motion to legalize same-sex marriage in Northern Ireland is blocked, causing a disconnect along the border.

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
